channel.title: Software on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Software on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense is the application class that handles a special type of Software License. Most software licenses are licensed to a specific hardware ID or IP address, this is tied to an account. seeAlso SoftLayer_Account SoftLayer_Software_Description Methods getAccount Retrieve the customer account this Account License belongs to. getAllObjects Return all account licenses getBillingItem Retrieve the billing item for a software account license.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component Service Datatype Description Every installed piece of software is represented in the API as a “Software Component.” This is the base class for software components, exposing basic functionality for software components. From any Software Component, through this service, you can get the hardware a component is installed upon, the license that this component is governed by, the current access passwords for a component, and the history of previous passwords for a component.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware Service Datatype Description This object specifies a specific type of Software Component: An Anti-virus/spyware instance. Methods getAverageInstallationDuration Retrieve the average amount of time that a software component takes to install. getBillingItem Retrieve the billing item for a software component. getHardware Retrieve the hardware this Software Component is installed upon. getLicenseFile Get the license file for a software component if it is supported.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps Service Datatype Description This service specifies a specific type of Software Component: A Host Intrusion Protection System instance. Methods getAverageInstallationDuration Retrieve the average amount of time that a software component takes to install. getBillingItem Retrieve the billing item for a software component. getCurrentHostIpsPolicies Get the current Host IPS policies. getHardware Retrieve the hardware this Software Component is installed upon.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Password
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Password Service Datatype Description The software component password service represents the passwords for a software component, such as an operating system or a control panel. Updating the passwords here will NOT update them on the server itself. Methods createObject Create a password for a software component. createObjects Create more than one password for a software component. deleteObject Delete a password from a software component.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description Service Datatype Description Methods getAllObjects getAttributes getAverageInstallationDuration Retrieve the average amount of time that a software description takes to install. getCompatibleSoftwareDescriptions Retrieve a list of the software descriptions that are compatible with this software description. getCustomerOwnedLicenseDescriptions getFeatures Retrieve the feature attributes of a software description. getLatestVersion Retrieve the latest version of a software description.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense is the application class that handles a special type of Software License. Most software licenses are licensed to a specific hardware ID; virtual licenses are designed for virtual machines and therefore are assigned to an IP Address. Not all software packages can be “virtual licensed”. SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense’s service allows you to retrieve the hard-copy license file for a virtual license, if one exists for your license instance.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense is a class that represents software licenses that are tied only to a customer’s account and not to any particular hardware, IP address, etc. seeAlso SoftLayer_Account SoftLayer_Software_Description Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer Account to which this Account License belongs to. Type: integer capacity Some Account Licenses have capacity information such as CPU specified in the units key.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_AccountLicense is a class that represents software licenses that are tied only to a customer’s account and not to any particular hardware, IP address, etc. Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer Account to which this Account License belongs to. Type: integer capacity Some Account Licenses have capacity information such as CPU specified in the units key. This provides the numerical representation of the capacity of the units.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Software_Component ties the installation of a specific piece of software onto a specific piece of hardware. SoftLayer_Software_Component works with SoftLayer_Software_License and SoftLayer_Software_Description to tie this all together. SoftLayer_Software_Component is the installation of a specific piece of software onto a specific piece of hardware in accordance to a software license. SoftLayer_Software_License dictates when and how a specific piece of software may be installed onto a piece of hardware.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component Service Datatype Description A SoftLayer_Software_Component ties the installation of a specific piece of software onto a specific piece of hardware. SoftLayer_Software_Component is the installation of a specific piece of software onto a specific piece of hardware in accordance to a software license. SoftLayer_Software_License dictates when and how a specific piece of software may be installed onto a piece of hardware.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Analytics
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_Analytics Datatype Description This object specifies a specific type of Software Component: An analytics instance. Analytics installations have a specific default ports and patterns for usernames and passwords. Defaults are initiated by this object. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer

Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description Datatype Description This class holds a description for a specific installation of a Software Component. SoftLayer_Software_Licenses tie a Software Component (A specific installation on a piece of hardware) to it’s description. The “Manufacturer” and “Name” properties of a SoftLayer_Software_Description are used by the framework to factory specific objects, objects that may have special methods for that specific piece of software, or objects that contain application specific data, such as default ports.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description Service Datatype Description This class holds a description for a specific installation of a Software Component. SoftLayer_Software_Licenses tie a Software Component (A specific installation on a piece of hardware) to it’s description. The “Manufacturer” and “Name” properties of a SoftLayer_Software_Description are used by the framework to factory specific objects, objects that may have special methods for that specific piece of software, or objects that contain application specific data, such as default ports.

Type: integer keyName A unique name used to reference this software description feature. Type: string

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description_RequiredUser
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description_RequiredUser Datatype Description This class represents a software description’s required user Local defaultPassword If the default password is set the user will be created with that password, otherwise a random password is generated. Type: string username If this software has a required user (such as "root") this string contains it's name. Type: string

Type: integer softwareDescriptionId The ID number of a Software Description that this specific license is valid for. Type: integer

Type: integer Relational account The account that owns this specific License instance.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense is the application class that handles a special type of Software License. Most software licenses are licensed to a specific hardware ID; virtual licenses are designed for virtual machines and therefore are assigned to an IP Address. Not all software packages can be “virtual licensed”. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense::getObject SoftLayer_Account::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Software_Description SoftLayer_Network_Subnet SoftLayer_Account Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer Account to which this Virtual License belongs to.

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense Service Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_VirtualLicense is the application class that handles a special type of Software License. Most software licenses are licensed to a specific hardware ID; virtual licenses are designed for virtual machines and therefore are assigned to an IP Address. Not all software packages can be “virtual licensed”. Local accountId The ID of the SoftLayer Account to which this Virtual License belongs to.

item.title: updateAntivirusSpywarePolicy
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpyware::updateAntivirusSpywarePolicy Overview Update an anti-virus/spyware policy. The policy options that it accepts are the following: *1 - Minimal *2 - Relaxed *3 - Default *4 - High *5 - Ultimate Parameters Name Type Description newPolicy string The new anti-virus policy. enforce boolean Enforce the updated policy Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Software_Component_AntivirusSpywareInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: updateHipsPolicies
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIps::updateHipsPolicies Overview Update the Host IPS policies. To retrieve valid policy options you must use the provided relationships. Parameters Name Type Description newIpsMode string IPS mode setting to be updated. newIpsProtection string IPS protection setting to be updated newFirewallMode string Firewall mode setting to be updated newFirewallRuleset string Firewall rule set setting to be updated newApplicationMode string Application mode setting to be updated newApplicationRuleset string Application rule set setting to be updated newEnforcementPolicy string Enforcement policy setting to be updated Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Software_Component_HostIpsInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
